Author: HeavenlyChorus
Description:
A similiar mod to 'Huge Numbers' by GregRising but with my preference over fonts.

More visible fonts than the vanilla ones, but not too huge to hurt the aesthetics.

Supports UHD.

(P.S: When you wanna switch between UHD and FHD textures, make sure to restart the game, otherwise it won't load properly)
Title: Improved Control Group Numbers
